titlepage.titleproper: Preliminary Inventory to the Kostas Kouvaras Papers, 1944-1947
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1998 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: Reports and transcriptions of radio messages, relating to activities of the Greek resistance organization EAM-ELAS during World War II. Includes reports by German, Greek collaborationists, and EAM-ELAS officials, and a statement by K. Kouvaras relating to the origins of the Greek Civil War. Photocopy.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Kostas Kouvaras papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Note
bioghist.p: First lieutenant, United States Army; head, Office of Strategic Services Pericles Mission to Greece, 1944-1945.

did.unittitle: Report on Pericles Mission by Lt. (JG) Carl Devoe, United States Naval Reserve, Labor Desk, SI-0-0SS, 1944 August 25
Field report by 1st. Lt. Costa G. Kouvaras (Pericles Mission), Labor Section, SI
German Situation Report, General Headquarters, 22nd XXII Mountain Army, 1944 July 8
Pericles Mission mailed reports from inside Greece during occupation
Radio messages from Pericles Mission to the OSS office in Cairo
Radio messages from the Cairo office of the OSS to the Pericles Mission in the Greek mountains
Reports by Costa G. Kouvaras to the OSS Athens office, after the liberation of Greece (sorted by month to 1945 July)
Daily ELAS (Greek Guerrilla Army) reports of the military situation
EAM-ELAS reports on the situation under occupation
Reports from the Greek Quisling government
Statement made by Costa G. Kouvaras before the Senate Foreign Relations Committee, 1947 March 31
